Crimes.Dispute_Type: Immigration application refusal based on marriage genuineness
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD's decision to uphold the visa officer's refusal was reasonable
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, S.O.R./2004-167
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Marriage assessed as not genuine due to incompatibility and lack of credible interaction
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered into primarily for immigration benefits
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to consider new evidence supporting marriage genuineness
Crimes.Application_Error: IAD failed to address new evidence contradicting initial concerns
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Remanded for rehearing by a different panel
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refusal of permanent residency upheld initially, then overturned
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Omission of key evidence in assessment
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, s. 300.1(1)(a)
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Perceived lack of genuine marital relationship
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to consider submitted letters, photos, and financial records
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Violation due to failure to consider all evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubt about authenticity of marital relationship
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review challenging reasonableness of IAD decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Omission of new evidence in final determination
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to address newly submitted evidence

Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage Fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Immigration application refusal based on suspicion of marriage fraud
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the marriage between Amar Singh and Geeta Rani is genuine or entered into for immigration purposes
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Marriage deemed not genuine due to minimal knowledge and lack of communication
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine, entered primarily for immigration status
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: IADâ€™s failure to assess new evidence supporting relationship authenticity
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to consider new evidence that contradicted initial findings
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision overturned, case remanded for rehearing
Crimes.Application_Factor: Evidence of ongoing relationship and financial support
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Initial refusal upheld by IAD, later overturned on judicial review
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Failure to properly evaluate credibility and evidence
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, s. 300.1(1)(a)
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remanded for rehearing with proper consideration of evidence
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspicion of marriage fraud due to incompatibility and lack of relationship evidence
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Overlooking new documentary evidence supporting marital genuineness
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Breach due to inadequate consideration of applicant's submissions
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubts about authenticity of spousal relationship
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on procedural unfairness and error of law
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to address new evidence in appeal decision
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to analyze newly submitted relationship evidence
